Author: sg777#2257
Content: Hi

Author: sg777#2257
Content: we like to write the set of API's that let us play the poker from the command line as per our design mentioned in the paper which we written...

Author: sg777#2257
Content: to start with, I written some stand alone basic set of API's here:

Author: sg777#2257
Content: https://github.com/sg777/bet

Author: sg777#2257
Content: I request you to have a look into them, and provide the suggestions and feedbacks and what all API's that would be necessary to add to develop the complete set of functionalities to play Poker...

- testing the just mentioned BET api
- setting up a node in the Lightning Network (see #chips-lightning)

There are also bounties for getting a Lightning Wallet to work with CHIPS, to manage payment channels through a GUI.

DM if interested
